Create a DIY candle scented with natural ingredients like lavender, rosemary, and cinnamon.
Use a diffuser to release essential oils like peppermint, eucalyptus, and lemon.
Use a plant-based air freshener made with baking soda and vinegar.
Create a natural air freshener by boiling water and adding a few drops of your favorite essential oils.
Make a homemade air freshener using a spray bottle filled with water and a few drops of essential oils, along with a few drops of natural extracts like vanilla or almond extract.
